EmailTemplate.subject: Make piloting easier
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Proven retrofit and upgrade solutions to make your current fleet more valuable, more efficient and more productive
By proactively responding to airline industry needs, Honeywell's products and integrated systems meet new and emerging standards and requirements, while enhancing the performance of existing aircraft functions. Find out more about our suite of products for terrain & traffic awareness, navigation and communication, to make the job of piloting easier:
- Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/terrain-awareness-and-navigation-assistance]]> promotes greater safety by enabling an aircraft to use precise GPS data for enhanced traffic situational awareness
- Integrated Multi-Mode Receiver (IMMR) <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/terrain-awareness-and-navigation-assistance]]> is industry’s only fully digital navigation receiver that integrates instrument landing systems (ILS), global positioning systems (GPS), GPS landing system (GLS) and VHF omnidirectional radio range (VOR) functionality into a single receiver
- Datalink Services <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/terrain-awareness-and-navigation-assistance]]> increase the speed and enhance the accuracy of information dissemination, both to and from the aircraft - Enhanced Ground Proximity Warning System (EGPWS) <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/terrain-awareness-and-navigation-assistance]]> reduces the risk of controlled flight into terrain by providing flight crews with timely, accurate information about terrain and obstacles in the area
- IntuVue 3-D Weather Radar System <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/terrain-awareness-and-navigation-assistance]]> provides the most complete, accurate and intuitive view of airborne weather hazards
Contact us today <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/terrain-awareness-and-navigation-assistance#standards-challenge]]> to know more about our retrofit and upgrade options that provide situational awareness of the aircraft and offer seamless communication between airborne and ground based systems.
Best regards
Honeywell Aerospace
